name: Ninjutsu Scrolls
description:
Weave through attacks, copy your enemies' jutsu and fulfill your mission in this fast-paced typing reaction game!

Inspired by Exit-84.

Facing performance issues? Try downloading the game(only for Windows), closing background applications or play with another browser. Best advised to play with a physical keyboard.

Shortcuts:

Shift + M -> Mute

Shift + S -> Skip Cutscene

Shift + F -> Toggle Fullscreen(unavailable for browser)

Shift + P -> Pause Game

Shift + R -> Reset Game(go back to Start Menu)(if halfway through game, resets back to first level)
